_header: Gods Son for the love of man
_description: A Christmas carol — four quatrains (aaab) and burden (bb): ‘Make we mery in this fest / For verbum caro factum est’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
Godes sonne for þe loue of maneflesshe & blode of mary he
                    nam…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…& so sayd þe prphett in hys loreverbo
                        prophesye

                        ed.
